data.actual_result: you need to go out of every mention menu before seeing the private message
data.expected_result: a window messaging the person pops up
data.short_description: Pressing on someone else's mention while in the mention menu makes you DM the person in the background
data.steps_to_repro: - open your recent mentions - show the details about a mention - look for someone else being mentioned in that menu - click on the mention
